Class CatchAPI

java.lang.Object
  com.catchnotes.api.CatchAPI

public class CatchAPI
extends java.lang.Object

Java Android interface to the Catch API.

Method Detail

signIn

public int signIn(java.lang.String user,
                  java.lang.String password,
                  CatchAccount account)
Sign in with a username and password.

Parameters:
user - Username or email address of the account.
password - Account password.
account - An optional CatchAccount object that will be filled in with account information.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

close

public void close()
Sign out.

setAccessToken

public void setAccessToken(java.lang.String accessToken)
Sign-in using a previously obtained access token.

Parameters:
accessToken - The access token.

getAccountInfo

public int getAccountInfo(java.lang.String user,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          CatchAccount account)
Get information about a user's account (user name, date created, etc).

Parameters:
user - Username or email address. Pass null if already signed in.
password - Account password. Pass null if already signed in.
account - CatchAccount object where information will be returned.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

getSyncV2

public int getSyncV2(java.util.List<CatchNoteRef> noteRefs)
Fetches a list of note references representing all of the user's notes.

Parameters:
noteRefs - List where fetched note refs will be returned.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

getNotesBulk

public int getNotesBulk(java.util.List<CatchNoteRef> noteRefs,
                        java.util.ArrayList<CatchNote> notes)
Fetches a list of specific requested notes.

Parameters:
noteRefs - List of note refs representing the notes you want to fetch.
notes - List where fetched notes will be returned.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

getNotes

public int getNotes(java.util.ArrayList<CatchNote> notes)
Fetches a list of all of the user's notes.

Parameters:
notes - List where fetched notes will be returned.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

getComments

public int getComments(long parentId,
                       java.util.ArrayList<CatchNote> notes)
Fetches a list of comments belonging to a certain note.

Parameters:
parentId - The parent note of the requested comments.
notes - List where fetched comments will be returned.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

getMedia

public int getMedia(java.lang.String uri,
                    java.lang.String size,
                    java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
Gets a data stream for a media item.

Parameters:
uri - The URI of the media to fetch. See CatchMedia.src.
size - If the media is an image, then you may pass IMAGE_SMALL, IMAGE_MEDIUM, or IMAGE_LARGE. Otherwise pass null.
outputStream - Data is returned here.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

addNote

public int addNote(CatchNote note)
Adds a new note to the account.

Parameters:
note - Note to be added.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

addMedia

public int addMedia(CatchMedia media)
Adds a media item to a note.

Parameters:
media - A CatchMedia object that specifies the media data and note ID.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

editNote

public int editNote(CatchNote note)
Edits an existing note.

Parameters:
note - Note to be updated. note.id must be a valid existing note id.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

deleteNote

public int deleteNote(java.lang.String id,
                      java.lang.String parentNodeId)
Deletes a note.

Parameters:
id - ID of the note to be deleted
parentNodeId - If you are deleting a comment, this is the parent note's ID.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success

deleteMedia

public int deleteMedia(java.lang.String noteId,
                       java.lang.String mediaId)
Deletes a media item.

Parameters:
noteId - The note containing the media you want to remove.
mediaId - ID of the media.
Returns:
RESULT_OK on success.

resultToString

public static java.lang.String resultToString(int code)
Helper function to turn return codes into readable text.

Parameters:
code - The code to convert.
Returns:
The String representation of the code.
